data.text:
And this is the 5 version from 95 to now ..( and the last) that i painted, a couple of months ago, but that i still photograph ....

this old but still a classic Laruccia for Pegaso

hello Luca View attachment 100166 View attachment 100167 View attachment 100168 View attachment 100169 View attachment 100166 View attachment 100167 View attachment 100168 View attachment 100169 View attachment 100170

Luca very very nice. Face full of character and eyes splendidly rendered.

As for the heraldry in 54mm scale this is superb. I hope I can paint like this one day.

Cheers

Nicolas

Very nice painting Luca. I have this one myself and have repainted it several times over the years and this is the latest incarnation. Nowhere near as good as yours, just for comparison.

Attached Files:

022.JPG

1.3 MB

Views:

231

Yes I know, but they look so good together and I would never put them in a competition.
